txt.en: You have been tasked with travelling to Dale and finding a potential visitor who might accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival. You should look around Dale for potential visitors.
Kh√¢taphos believes that there may be some among the Men of Dale who could use a tropical holiday.
'Leave me alone, or I shall call a guard!'
\qI beg your pardon?! Leave me be.'
'Excuse me, but I don't have time for this.'
'You know, I have always wanted to leave this place. Yes, I will do it!'

'During my time at sea, we ah... confiscated kegs of a biscuit called \qDale-men's Cram\q on more than one occasion. I cannot say much for the taste, but they are quite hearty and can sustain men at sea for some time. It begs the question, though, who are these Men of Dale, and do they not know of flavoured foods? We can introduce them to many spices!

'This Dale must be somewhere north along the great river you call the Anduin. Go there and find someone who might cheerfully accept an invitation. Mind that you do not bother too many people who would not be open to such a journey, or people will think you a pest and grow to have a poor opinion of us.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
'You're right. This Dale is too crowded and I could use a holiday!'
You have found potential visitors in Dale. You should choose one who is most likely to accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival and invite them.
'When you are ready, go to this Dale and find someone to invite to visit us in Furtherholm.'
